Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.activation

Defines annotations and interfaces for declaring and accessing dependencies.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRankedService<S>
    Sortable reference to a service implementation (referent).
    IRankedServiceEventContext<S>
    Ranked service event context, providing access to the ranked service associated with the event.
    IRankedServiceEventListener<S>
    Ranked service event listener, providing notifications as services are dynamically added and removed.
    IRankedServiceTracker<S>
    Tracks and ranks instances of a specified service interface.
    IService<S>
    Defines a typed service, with optional OSGi service filter properties.
    IServiceActivator
    Declared using package annotations, instantiated when all mandatory dependencies are resolved, and usually provides further services for implementing an application.
    IServiceContext
    Provides access to declared dependencies, and other resources.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActivationLevel
    Defines the required activation level requirements for provided services.
    ServiceFilter.ValueType
    Defines the default string-based value type, and other supported value types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UndeclaredDependencyException
    Thrown when attempting to access an undeclared dependency.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ActivationServices
    Declares dependencies required when activating a bundle, and declares provided services and other resources.
    Configuration
    Defines a configuration store dependency.
    Dictionary
    Declares a dictionary embedded in the bundle, and which should be registered and made available as a service.
    Implementation
    Declares an implementation of a published OSGi service.
    ProvideService
    Declares a service that may be registered (published) when the service activator is instantiated.
    RequireService
    Declares a service dependency, used by the service activator.
    ServiceFilter
    Declares a filter for a subscribed service.

Package fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.activation Description

Defines annotations and interfaces for declaring and accessing dependencies.

To create a bundle using these annotations, create a package-info.java (in your bundle's main package) and annotate your package using the ActivationServices annotation.

You must then ensure your that your MANIFEST.MF defines the Bundle-Activator header, referring to an instance of AnnotationActivator in your bundle's main package. This class can be automatically generated using the ViewShell SDK's codegen.jar tool, using the -processorpath attribute of the JDK's javac compiler tool. The codegen.jar tool is not required at runtime.

The base implementation of AnnotationActivator is defined in the system.activation bundle.

Since:
1.0
Author:
REFLEXE Technologies
See Also:
JLS - Packages
